attributes.title: ✨✨✨Dumb sh*t I’ve ever seen✨✨✨
attributes.review: This app was so dumb. It also kept shutting down. Prob cuz it was so bad. Honestly just take it down🤩🤩🤩

attributes.title: EWWWW 🤢🤮
attributes.review: first of all the app took 12747398 weeks to download.. anyways i downloaded the app in high hopes of seeing my beautiful president but instead they place a MONSTROUS ORANGE HIDEOUS MONSTER on my screen 🤧 almost acted the hispanic outta me !! anyways would NOT recommend

attributes.title: horrible app i can’t ever look at it again
attributes.review: this app is horrible it literally did nothing. it has ruined everything in my phone with those colors and the T. it also is a spam i can’t vote for anyone else in it like why would you do that. also when the oompa loompa showed up i was very confused because i’m not watching Willy Wonka... this is a horrible app and i don’t recommend it.unless you hate the app too ;)

attributes.title: trump sucks🤠
attributes.review: i logged into the account and then i immediately saw glitches. also, we never had an app for obama! why does a misogynist, lgbtq+ hater, racist guy get to have one? it doesn’t make any sense. you should delete the app👀

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: The app was glitching so I redownloaded it but it KEPT ON GLITCHING. I think it’s because bunker b**ch came up with the concept. Anything he comes up with seems to go terribly wrong. Don’t recommend downloading or supporting this app. All apps matter but this one doesn’t
